title: Can`t acces the shop :(
body: When i try to go in shop i get a error 403 ( 403 forbidden -> cloudflare - nginx ) . Any help plz?

replies.body: It sounds like you may be getting the store issue we recently became aware of. We're working to get the store back up, and you can stay updated on the progress on our post [**here**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/lKb27XVQ-problems-getting-the-store-to-load).
The problem dissapeared after i played a match , ty for trying to help <3
